title: MojoCoin (MOJO) One Day Trading Volume Hits $2,230.00
content: MojoCoin (CURRENCY:MOJO) traded up 10.9% against the dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM ET on May 26th. One MojoCoin coin can now be purchased for approximately $0.0229 or 0.00000300 BTC on exchanges including CoinExchange,  Livecoin,  YoBit and  Cryptopia. MojoCoin has a total market capitalization of $279,692.00 and approximately $2,230.00 worth of MojoCoin was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. During the last seven days, MojoCoin has traded 9% lower  against the dollar.    Here’s how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last 24 hours:    Get MojoCoin alerts:     Particl (PART) traded up 7.7% against the dollar and now trades at $8.81 or 0.00115319 BTC.  Phore (PHR) traded 4.5% lower  against the dollar and now trades at $1.79 or 0.00023436 BTC.  NoLimitCoin (NLC2) traded down 0.9% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0545 or 0.00000713 BTC.  TokenStars (TEAM) traded 18.8% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.18 or 0.00002375 BTC.  Shorty (SHORTY) traded flat against the dollar and now trades at $0.0104 or 0.00000136 BTC.  Bitradio (BRO) traded 37.7% lower  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0577 or 0.00000755 BTC.  SatoshiMadness (MAD) traded up 2.8% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0001 or 0.00000001 BTC.  WARP (WARP) traded flat against the dollar and now trades at $0.0677 or 0.00000735 BTC.  Creatio (XCRE) traded 2.6% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0021 or 0.00000028 BTC.  Iconic (ICON) traded 20.7% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.0679 or 0.00000889 BTC.   MojoCoin Profile      MojoCoin (CRYPTO:MOJO) is a proof-of-stake (PoS) coin that uses the PoS hashing algorithm. It was first traded on February 9th, 2016. MojoCoin’s total supply is 12,212,434 coins. MojoCoin’s official Twitter account is @Mojodevs and its Facebook page is accessible here . MojoCoin’s official website is mojocoin.org .    Buying and Selling MojoCoin    MojoCoin can be traded on the following cryptocurrency exchanges:  YoBit,  Livecoin,  Cryptopia and CoinExchange.  It is usually not possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as MojoCoin directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to acquire MojoCoin should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Gemini, GDAX or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy MojoCoin using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
